content:
As an AI language model, I do not have the specifics of Digital Television's partnerships with streaming services. However, it's not uncommon for networks and streaming services to collaborate and share content. Many channels have partnered with streaming services to bring popular shows to their viewers.

Digital Television may have similar partnerships with streaming services such as Netflix or Hulu, where they may air some of their content on their channel. These partnerships can be mutually beneficial, as it allows the networks to feature popular and critically acclaimed shows from streaming services, and the streaming services gain the opportunity to expand their audience reach.

Therefore, it's always good to keep an eye on Digital Television's programming as they may feature shows from streaming services that you enjoy watching. You can also suggest Digital Television to partner with certain streaming services to bring their content to your favorite network.
